name: substation
content:
substation noun
(ELECTRICITY)
electricity substation (US also substation)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a place that allows electricity to go from one part of the electricity production system to another: Rebels have attacked an electricity substation just outside the city.
See more
substation noun
(PART OF ORGANIZATION)
[ C ] US a division of an organization that works under the general control of a larger office: a police substation
